com.knockknock.server

Class KKMultiServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.knockknock.server.KKMultiServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class KKMultiServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

    Knock Knock Server

    Class that creates a Server Socket instance listening on a specific port. Creates new thread for each connection.

    Class can only be instantiated once. Multiple instances are not allowed.

    Since:
    02/25/2018
    Version:
    %I%, %G%
    Author:
    Radoslav Radoev
